root: ^I know why you’ve chosen to become a tree.
^In a sense, we share a common belief:
^And so, you've taken on this solitary role.
^I can see your goal, your rooted ideals.
^There's no way we can defeat you, almighty Tree.
^Indeed, this is the one of the few places the king himself cannot subjugate.
^But if we were to back down now, it would destroy their spirit, and they would never muster the courage to take on the evil king.
^To relegate yourself to such a life...
^To be little more than a mere statue...
^Yes, you're a force to be feared, but you lack autonomy.
^You've been carrying this burden for so long now, I can't help but wonder if you've lost your sense of self.
^I will liberate you from your pitiful existence.
